mapper.sql: select w.vendor_inner_sn as org_id, h.name as org_name, w.odo_inner_sn, w.organization_inner_sn, w.organization_name, w.auditor_inner_sn, w.auditor_name,w.warehouse_inner_sn, w.warehouse_name, w.handler_inner_sn, IFNULL(w.printed,0) as printed, w.handler_name, w.making_people_inner_sn, w.making_people_name, w.warehouse_operator_inner_sn, w.warehouse_operator_name, w.type_inner_sn, w.type_name, w.department_inner_sn, w.department_name, w.status, w.out_time, w.odo_sn, w.description, 6 as billsType, a.voucher_type_c, a.voucher_inner_sn_c from vendor_dealer_odo w left join vendor h on h.vendor_inner_sn = w.vendor_inner_sn left join ( select * from ( select vendor_inner_sn, odo_inner_sn, voucher_type_c, voucher_inner_sn_c from vendor_dealer_odo_product_detail where vendor_inner_sn = #{org_id} and odo_inner_sn = #{odo_inner_sn} ) b group by vendor_inner_sn, odo_inner_sn, voucher_type_c, voucher_inner_sn_c ) a on a.vendor_inner_sn = w.vendor_inner_sn and a.odo_inner_sn = w.odo_inner_sn
mapper.select: where 1=1 and w.vendor_inner_sn = #{org_id} and w.odo_inner_sn = #{odo_inner_sn}

select w.odo_inner_sn, w.organization_inner_sn, w.organization_name, w.auditor_name, w.warehouse_inner_sn, w.warehouse_name, w.handler_name, w.making_people_name, w.warehouse_operator_name, w.type_inner_sn, w.type_name, w.out_time, w.odo_sn, w.description, 6 as billsType from vendor_dealer_odo w where 1=1 and w.vendor_inner_sn = #{org_id} and w.odo_inner_sn = #{odo_inner_sn}

call v_add_vendor_dealer_odo( #{org_id_i ,mode=IN}, #{organization_inner_sn_i ,mode=IN}, #{warehouse_inner_sn_i ,mode=IN}, #{handler_inner_sn_i ,mode=IN}, #{making_people_inner_sn_i ,mode=IN}, #{auditor_inner_sn_i ,mode=IN}, #{warehouse_operator_inner_sn_i ,mode=IN}, #{type_inner_sn_i ,mode=IN}, #{department_inner_sn_i ,mode=IN}, #{status_i ,mode=IN}, #{out_time_i ,mode=IN}, #{odo_sn_i ,mode=IN}, #{description_i ,mode=IN}, #{organization_name_i ,mode=IN}, #{warehouse_name_i ,mode=IN}, #{handler_name_i ,mode=IN}, #{making_people_name_i ,mode=IN}, #{auditor_name_i ,mode=IN}, #{warehouse_operator_name_i ,mode=IN}, #{type_name_i ,mode=IN}, #{department_name_i ,mode=IN}, #{use_department_i ,mode=IN}, #{printed_i ,mode=IN}, #{odo_inner_sn_o ,mode=OUT,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{result_o ,mode=OUT,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{error_code_o ,mode=OUT,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{sql_state_o ,mode=OUT,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{message_string_o ,mode=OUT,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.delete: delete from vendor_dealer_odo where vendor_inner_sn = #{org_id} and odo_inner_sn = #{odo_inner_sn}
mapper.select: select d.vendor_inner_sn as org_id, d.odo_inner_sn, d.detail_inner_sn, d.product_vendor_inner_sn as vendor_inner_sn, d.product_inner_sn, d.specification_inner_sn, d.unit_inner_sn, d.mdrf_inner_sn, d.unit_price/10000 as unit_price, d.quantity/1000 as quantity, d.produce_date, d.overdue_date, d.type, d.sort_number, d.batch_number, d.product_vendor_name as vendor_name, d.product_name, d.specification, d.unit as unit_name, d.mdrf_sn, d.voucher_type_c, d.voucher_inner_sn_c, d.voucher_detail_inner_sn_c, 1 as product_type, d.health_care_sn, d.rate,ps.`specification_vendor_sn`, d.buying_price/10000 as buying_price from vendor_dealer_odo_product_detail d left join product_specification ps ON d.product_vendor_inner_sn=ps.`vendor_inner_sn` AND d.`product_inner_sn`=ps.`product_inner_sn` AND d.`specification_inner_sn`=ps.`specification_inner_sn` where 1=1 and d.vendor_inner_sn = #{org_id} and d.odo_inner_sn = #{odo_inner_sn} and d.detail_inner_sn = #{detail_inner_sn}

select detail_inner_sn, product_vendor_inner_sn, product_inner_sn, specification_inner_sn, c_get_product_min_unit(product_vendor_inner_sn, product_inner_sn, specification_inner_sn,unit_inner_sn) as unit, (unit_price/c_calculate_product_min_unit(product_vendor_inner_sn, product_inner_sn, specification_inner_sn,unit_inner_sn))/10000 as unit_price, (quantity/c_calculate_product_min_unit(product_vendor_inner_sn, product_inner_sn, specification_inner_sn,unit_inner_sn))/1000 as quantity, produce_date, overdue_date, batch_number, health_care_sn, rate, mdrf_inner_sn, product_vendor_name, product_name, specification, mdrf_sn, 1 as product_type from vendor_dealer_odo_product_detail where 1=1 and vendor_inner_sn = #{org_id} and odo_inner_sn = #{odo_inner_sn} and detail_inner_sn = #{detail_inner_sn}

call v_add_vendor_dealer_odo_product_detail( #{org_id_i ,mode=IN}, #{odo_inner_sn_i ,mode=IN}, #{product_vendor_inner_sn_i ,mode=IN}, #{product_inner_sn_i ,mode=IN}, #{specification_inner_sn_i ,mode=IN}, #{unit_inner_sn_i ,mode=IN}, #{mdrf_inner_sn_i ,mode=IN}, #{unit_price_i ,mode=IN}, #{quantity_i ,mode=IN}, #{produce_date_i ,mode=IN}, #{overdue_date_i ,mode=IN}, #{type_i ,mode=IN}, #{sort_number_i ,mode=IN}, #{batch_number_i ,mode=IN}, #{product_vendor_name_i ,mode=IN}, #{product_name_i ,mode=IN}, #{specification_i ,mode=IN}, #{unit_i ,mode=IN}, #{mdrf_sn_i ,mode=IN}, #{voucher_type_c_i ,mode=IN}, #{voucher_inner_sn_c_i ,mode=IN}, #{voucher_detail_inner_sn_c_i ,mode=IN}, #{health_care_sn_i ,mode=IN}, #{rate_i ,mode=IN}, #{buying_price_i ,mode=IN}, #{detail_inner_sn_o ,mode=OUT,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{result_o ,mode=OUT,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{error_code_o ,mode=OUT,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{sql_state_o ,mode=OUT,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{message_string_o ,mode=OUT,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

select distinct m.employee_inner_sn, e.name as employee_name from vendor_employee_vendor_warehouse_model m INNER join vendor_employee e using(vendor_inner_sn,employee_inner_sn) where 1=1 and m.vendor_inner_sn = #{org_id} and m.warehouse_model_inner_sn in (${warehouse_model_inner_sn})
SELECT dealer_inner_sn as org_id, name, social_credit_code, 'VD' as billsType FROM dealer WHERE 1=1 AND status=1 AND is_delete = 0 and name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')

select distinct concat(ps.vendor_inner_sn, '-', ps.product_inner_sn, '-', ps.specification_inner_sn, '-1') as id, p.product_vendor_inner_sn as vendor_inner_sn, p.product_vendor_name as vendor_name, p.product_inner_sn, p.product_name, p.specification_inner_sn, p.specification, 1 as product_type, p1.newest_register_sn as mdrf_sn, ps.common_use_unit_inner_sn, ps.common_use_unit, ps.specification_vendor_sn, p.unit as min_unit, p.unit_inner_sn as min_unit_inner_sn
, sum(p.quantity)/1000 as quantity , p.warehouse_inner_sn , m.name as warehouse_name
from vendor_product_min_unit_inventory p
left join vendor_warehouse_model m on p.vendor_inner_sn=m.vendor_inner_sn and p.warehouse_inner_sn=m.warehouse_model_inner_sn
left join product p1 on p1.vendor_inner_sn=p.product_vendor_inner_sn and p1.product_inner_sn=p.product_inner_sn left join product_specification ps on ps.vendor_inner_sn=p.product_vendor_inner_sn and ps.product_inner_sn=p.product_inner_sn and ps.specification_inner_sn=p.specification_inner_sn and length(trim(ps.common_use_unit))>0 where 1=1 and quantity > 0 and p.vendor_inner_sn = #{org_id}
AND p.`warehouse_inner_sn` IN
#{warehouseId}
and p1.type_inner_sn = #{type_inner_sn} and p1.code68_sn = #{code68_sn} and (p.product_name like concat('%', #{name}, '%') OR p1.pinyin like concat('%', #{name}, '%')) and p.product_vendor_inner_sn = #{vendor_inner_sn} and p.specification like concat('%', #{specification}, '%') and ps.specification_vendor_sn like concat('%', #{specification_vendor_sn}, '%')
group by p.product_vendor_inner_sn,p.product_inner_sn, p.product_name, p.specification_inner_sn ,p.warehouse_inner_sn ORDER BY p.product_vendor_inner_sn ASC,p.product_inner_sn ASC , p.specification_inner_sn ASC,p.warehouse_inner_sn ASC

select distinct p.product_vendor_inner_sn as vendor_inner_sn, p.product_vendor_name as vendor_name, p.product_inner_sn, p.product_name, p.specification_inner_sn, p.specification, 1 as product_type, p1.newest_register_sn as mdrf_sn, ps.common_use_unit_inner_sn, ps.common_use_unit, ps.specification_vendor_sn from vendor_product_min_unit_inventory p left join product p1 on p1.vendor_inner_sn=p.product_vendor_inner_sn and p1.product_inner_sn=p.product_inner_sn left join product_specification ps on ps.vendor_inner_sn=p.product_vendor_inner_sn and ps.product_inner_sn=p.product_inner_sn and ps.specification_inner_sn=p.specification_inner_sn where 1=1 and quantity > 0 and p.vendor_inner_sn = #{org_id} and (p.product_name like concat('%', #{key}, '%') or p.specification like concat('%', #{key}, '%') or ps.specification_vendor_sn like concat('%', #{key}, '%') or p.product_vendor_name like concat('%', #{key}, '%'))
SELECT c_calculate_dealer_product_min_unit(#{product_vendor_inner_sn}, #{product_inner_sn}, #{specification_inner_sn}, #{unit_inner_sn}) * #{quantity} FROM dual
SELECT c_calculate_product_min_unit(#{product_vendor_inner_sn}, #{product_inner_sn}, #{specification_inner_sn}, #{unit_inner_sn}) * #{quantity} FROM dual

SELECT DISTINCT org_id, organization_inner_sn, sl_inner_sn, seller_inner_sn, department_inner_sn, d.status, sl_sn, seller_linkman, seller_phone, organization_name, seller_name, department_name, 6 as billsType, d.description FROM ( SELECT vendor_inner_sn as org_id, organization_inner_sn, organization_name, sl_inner_sn, seller_inner_sn, department_inner_sn, status, sl_sn, seller_linkman, seller_phone, seller_name, department_name, description, detail_inner_sn, quantity FROM vendor_dealer_sl JOIN ( SELECT d.vendor_inner_sn, d.sl_inner_sn, d.detail_inner_sn, quantity FROM vendor_dealer_sl_product_detail d where 1=1 and d.product_name like concat('%',#{product_name},'%') ) a using(vendor_inner_sn, sl_inner_sn) WHERE 1=1 and status = 2 and vendor_inner_sn = #{org_id} ) d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(quantity) AS quantity ,vendor_inner_sn, voucher_inner_sn_c, voucher_detail_inner_sn_c FROM vendor_dealer_odo_product_detail WHERE voucher_type_c=2 and product_name like concat('%',#{product_name},'%') GROUP BY vendor_inner_sn, voucher_inner_sn_c, voucher_detail_inner_sn_c)r ON d.org_id=r.vendor_inner_sn and d.sl_inner_sn=r.voucher_inner_sn_c and d.detail_inner_sn=r.voucher_detail_inner_sn_c and r.quantity >=d.quantity WHERE org_id = #{org_id} and r.vendor_inner_sn is null and sl_sn like concat('%', #{sl_sn}, '%') and organization_name like concat('%', #{organization_name}, '%') UNION DISTINCT SELECT DISTINCT org_id, organization_inner_sn, sl_inner_sn, seller_inner_sn, department_inner_sn, d.status, sl_sn, seller_linkman, seller_phone, organization_name, seller_name, department_name, 7 as billsType, d.description FROM ( SELECT vendor_inner_sn as org_id, organization_inner_sn, organization_name, sl_inner_sn, seller_inner_sn, department_inner_sn, status, sl_sn, seller_linkman, seller_phone, seller_name, department_name, description, detail_inner_sn, quantity FROM vendor_hospital_sl JOIN ( SELECT d.vendor_inner_sn, d.sl_inner_sn, d.detail_inner_sn, quantity FROM vendor_hospital_sl_product_detail d where 1=1 and d.product_name like concat('%',#{product_name},'%') ) a using(vendor_inner_sn, sl_inner_sn) WHERE 1=1 and status = 2 and vendor_inner_sn = #{org_id} ) d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(quantity) AS quantity ,vendor_inner_sn, voucher_inner_sn_c, voucher_detail_inner_sn_c FROM vendor_hospital_odo_product_detail WHERE voucher_type_c=2 and product_name like concat('%',#{product_name},'%') GROUP BY vendor_inner_sn, voucher_inner_sn_c, voucher_detail_inner_sn_c)r ON d.org_id=r.vendor_inner_sn and d.sl_inner_sn=r.voucher_inner_sn_c and d.detail_inner_sn=r.voucher_detail_inner_sn_c and r.quantity >=d.quantity WHERE org_id = #{org_id} and r.vendor_inner_sn is null and sl_sn like concat('%', #{sl_sn}, '%') and organization_name like concat('%', #{organization_name}, '%')

SELECT d.sl_inner_sn, d.detail_inner_sn, d.product_vendor_inner_sn, d.product_inner_sn, d.specification_inner_sn, d.unit_inner_sn, d.mdrf_inner_sn, IFNULL(d.quantity/1000,0) as quantity, IFNULL(r.quantity/1000,0) as outOfStock_quantity, IFNULL((d.quantity-r.quantity)/1000, d.quantity/1000) as toBeOutOfStock_quantity, d.unit_price/10000 as unit_price, d.discount, d.rate, d.sort_number, d.batch_number, d.product_vendor_name, d.product_name, d.health_care_sn, d.specification, d.unit, d.mdrf_sn, product_type, CASE WHEN r.quantity >= d.quantity THEN 2 ELSE 1 END AS status, IFNULL(produce_date,'') AS produce_date, IFNULL(overdue_date,'') AS overdue_date FROM ( SELECT vendor_inner_sn AS org_id, sl_inner_sn, detail_inner_sn, product_vendor_inner_sn, product_inner_sn, specification_inner_sn, d.unit_inner_sn, mdrf_inner_sn, d.quantity, unit_price, discount, rate, sort_number, batch_number, d.product_vendor_name, d.product_name, d.specification, d.unit, mdrf_sn, organization_inner_sn, produce_date, overdue_date, 1 as product_type, d.health_care_sn FROM vendor_dealer_sl_product_detail d JOIN vendor_dealer_sl s USING(vendor_inner_sn, sl_inner_sn) LEFT JOIN( select vendor_inner_sn, product_vendor_inner_sn, product_inner_sn, specification_inner_sn, batch_number, produce_date, overdue_date from vendor_product_min_unit_inventory group by vendor_inner_sn, product_vendor_inner_sn, product_inner_sn, specification_inner_sn, batch_number ) mui USING(vendor_inner_sn, product_vendor_inner_sn, product_inner_sn, specification_inner_sn, batch_number) WHERE s.status = 2 and vendor_inner_sn = #{org_id} AND sl_inner_sn = #{sl_inner_sn} ) d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(quantity),0) AS quantity ,vendor_inner_sn, voucher_inner_sn_c, voucher_detail_inner_sn_c FROM vendor_dealer_odo_product_detail WHERE voucher_type_c=2 AND vendor_inner_sn = #{org_id} AND voucher_inner_sn_c = #{sl_inner_sn} GROUP BY vendor_inner_sn, voucher_inner_sn_c, voucher_detail_inner_sn_c)r ON d.org_id=r.vendor_inner_sn and d.sl_inner_sn=r.voucher_inner_sn_c and d.detail_inner_sn=r.voucher_detail_inner_sn_c WHERE org_id = #{org_id} AND sl_inner_sn = #{sl_inner_sn} and d.detail_inner_sn = #{detail_inner_sn}

SELECT d.sl_inner_sn, d.product_vendor_inner_sn, d.product_inner_sn, d.specification_inner_sn, d.unit_inner_sn, SUM(IFNULL((d.quantity-r.quantity)/1000, d.quantity/1000)) as toBeOutOfStock_quantity, product_type FROM ( SELECT vendor_inner_sn AS org_id, sl_inner_sn, detail_inner_sn, product_vendor_inner_sn, product_inner_sn, specification_inner_sn, d.unit_inner_sn, mdrf_inner_sn, d.quantity, unit_price, discount, rate, sort_number, batch_number, d.product_vendor_name, d.product_name, d.specification, d.unit, mdrf_sn, organization_inner_sn, produce_date, overdue_date, 1 as product_type FROM vendor_dealer_sl_product_detail d JOIN vendor_dealer_sl s USING(vendor_inner_sn, sl_inner_sn) LEFT JOIN( select vendor_inner_sn, product_vendor_inner_sn, product_inner_sn, specification_inner_sn, batch_number, produce_date, overdue_date from vendor_product_min_unit_inventory group by vendor_inner_sn, product_vendor_inner_sn, product_inner_sn, specification_inner_sn, batch_number ) mui USING(vendor_inner_sn, product_vendor_inner_sn, product_inner_sn, specification_inner_sn, batch_number) WHERE s.status = 2 and vendor_inner_sn = #{org_id} AND sl_inner_sn = #{sl_inner_sn} ) d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(quantity),0) AS quantity ,vendor_inner_sn, voucher_inner_sn_c, voucher_detail_inner_sn_c FROM vendor_dealer_odo_product_detail WHERE voucher_type_c=2 AND vendor_inner_sn = #{org_id} AND voucher_inner_sn_c = #{sl_inner_sn} GROUP BY vendor_inner_sn, voucher_inner_sn_c, voucher_detail_inner_sn_c)r ON d.org_id=r.vendor_inner_sn and d.sl_inner_sn=r.voucher_inner_sn_c and d.detail_inner_sn=r.voucher_detail_inner_sn_c WHERE org_id = #{org_id} AND sl_inner_sn = #{sl_inner_sn} and product_vendor_inner_sn = #{vendor_inner_sn} and product_inner_sn = #{product_inner_sn} and specification_inner_sn = #{specification_inner_sn} GROUP BY sl_inner_sn, product_vendor_inner_sn, product_inner_sn, specification_inner_sn, unit_inner_sn, product_type
